Text:
Classification: Scripted
Genre: Drama
Status: New Series
Network: ITV1 ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Sundays at 09:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: August 19, 2012

The Last Weekend is a drama series starring Rupert Penry-Jones, Shaun Evans, Genevieve O'Reilly and Claire Keelan. A short break in the Suffolk countryside gives a rare opportunity for two couples to spend some quality time together. The two men, Ian and Ollie, are friends from university, but they have gone on to live very different lives. The competitive edge to the men's relationship soon rises to the surface, leading to shocking consequences for everybody.
